resources.string: Location not found check your preference!
GPS not connected, we recommend to connect it. Do you want?
Some useful help to make the app work better
Useful to know how the system works
If you have some problem or question don\'t doubt and ask us!
Press this button to set manually a new alarm
Press this button to remove alarm
Tap on the map to set a new Alarm at this point
"You can navigate on the map by draging, pitching... "
Press ALA icon to follow us on twitter
In this box you can input your destination (AutoCompletTextBox)
Drag this bar to set the number of meters before being advised
Set or cancel the alarm buttons

It\'s a simple APP, that lets you fix an alarm to wake you up when you get close to your destination. So you fix the point on the map with your finger and set the number of meters, ALA will notify you when you get close to it.
If you often use public transport or you just want to know when you are close to a place, this APP is ideal for you. Never fall asleep again and miss your stop.

It uses your location to know where you are. With this it can determine the distance between your position and the point that you selected on the map. Depending on the system that is activated works better or not, so if you are on 3G it gets your location based on the anthems, it\'s not accurate depending on the area, so we recommend to use GPS
It consumes a lot of resource and battery?
NO! we are using an algorithm based on the distance of your trip, so it adjust the GPS or the location request to avoid unnecessary access, so the battery is saved.
How many meters should I select?
If you are not using GPS or wifi we recommend to always put the MAX meters adviser, if you use GPS it\'s up to you
What\'s on your mind? ask it!
Fill all the fields before send it
If you want to remove the Ads think on buying ALA plus (with more features)

Thanks to use ALA, this screen will only appear the first time. We just want to orientate you around this APP. It\'s a really simple and easy APP, but we extremely recommend you to take a look at the section TIP and FAQ to use it on the right way. Hope you like it!
